software.description:
EyeBallGUI is a tool for interactively viewing & marking multi-channel biosignals

Please cite using:
https://doi.org/10.1101/129437

[1] K. Mohr, B. Nasseroleslami, P. M. Iyer, O. Hardiman, and E. C. Lalor, ‘EyeBallGUI: A Tool For Visual Inspection And Binary Marking of Multi-Channel Bio-Signals’, bioRxiv, p. 129437, May 2017.
software.maintainer: Trinity College Dublin, the University of Dubin
